job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Contract:&nbsp;</strong>6 Month Contract-to-Hire</p><p><strong>Remote:&nbsp;</strong>100% Remote</p><p><strong>Interview Process</strong>: 30 min video interview/ then 1 hour video interview</p><p><br></p><p>This will be a 6-month contract with FTE conversion. This is a 100% remote role, where you will be working on an exciting, cutting-edge team.&nbsp;This position develops efficient and scalable data science systems that enable integration of machine learning (ML) applications into healthcare operations, strategy, value improvement, care advancement, patient safety and satisfaction.&nbsp;This position will partner with data scientists, application developers, data architects, and system engineers to recommend and develop ML systems and pipelines.&nbsp;This position will be responsible for learning, recommending, and implementing cutting edge machine learning methodologies and tools in creative and novel ways.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications Needed:</strong></p><ul><li>CI / CD Experience</li><li>Data Engineering experience (full project life cycle, deployment to production)</li><li>Data science exposure</li></ul><p></p>
